title: kETTa varam
sahitya:
kETTa varam aruLum vaLLalE ennai ATTi vaippadun tiruvuLLamO enrum


anupallavi

  kUTTi bhakti rasamUTTi karuNaikkai nITTi bhava vinai OTTi bhaktargutk-


caraNam    pAraLanda unran padamalar tEDi bhAgavtOttamar onru kUDi
 pErAnandam tarum nin pugazh pADi pAnguDan pErinba vIDadai nADik-
